divs: sighting detailsat about 10pm i was looking out my window of my (top floor 5th floor) apartment building, facing south, with a good wide view of the sky, despite some trees. directly above me-and-building, moves this white glowing but diffused light larger than a star. it is coming from north-west going south east. about as fast as a sorta low small plane, i guess. an aircraft (plane) is coming from east and going west, at the same moment. (about 8 inches at arm's length, up from my horizon, i think.) when the object\light is about 1 half inch (at arm's length) from the plane's nose, it vanishes.
Summary: Odd diffused light comes at plane
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rock Falls
There were no other sightings in Rock Falls on or around June 21st 2012
